document_data.name: Zarrick
document_data.mainbody: '''Zarrick the Sorcerer''' was an evil magic-user member of the [[Assassins Guild of the Galenas]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History:
Zarrick originally served in [[Vaasa]]'s army. After the war's end, he started wandering until he was recruited by the [[Grandfather of Assassins]].

In 1357 DR, he was a key member of the punitive army that went to attack [[Bloodstone Village]].
document_data.Personality: Zarrick was specialized in battle-magic. He was a boisterous and outgoing individual. He was fast in making friends but also in losing them. Zarrick was greedy and selfish despite his manners and most people quickly abandoned  him.
